narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: National Mentor Healthcare LLC is a Psychologist  Intellectual & Developmental Disabilities provider based in Millsboro, DE. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $108.7M in Medicaid payments across 309K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $108.7M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,584 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
